snippet: Attacks across Iraq killed nine people on Monday, including a 10-year-old boy, the latest in a surge of violence rocking Iraq during the Muslim holy month of Ramadan.
abstract: Attacks across Iraq kill nine people, latest in surge of violence rocking the country during Muslim holy month of Ramadan.
lead_paragraph: Attacks across Iraq killed nine people on Monday, including a 10-year-old boy, the latest in a surge of violence rocking Iraq during the Muslim holy month of Ramadan.
